com.ochafik.util.listenable
Class AdaptedCollection<U,V>

java.lang.Object
  java.util.AbstractCollection<V>
      com.ochafik.util.listenable.AdaptedCollection<U,V>
Type Parameters:
U - type of the elements of the wrapped collection
V - type of the elements of this collection
All Implemented Interfaces:
ListenableCollection<V>, java.lang.Iterable<V>, java.util.Collection<V>
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdaptedList
public class AdaptedCollection<U,V>
extends java.util.AbstractCollection<V>
implements ListenableCollection<V>

ListenableCollection that wraps a Collection, using adapters from U to V (and optionnally backwards, for support of the add(V) method).
This is useful to convert a collection to another type : as there is no copy of the wrapped collection, both collections stay in sync.
The resulting wrapped collection is listenable, and listens to modifications of its wrapped collection if it is an instance of ListenableCollection.
